text: Thodiyoor is a village in Kollam district in the state of Kerala, India. ==Demographics- Census 2011 Data== Information Figure Remark Population 25884 Males 12333 Females 13551 0-6 age group 2872 11.10% of population Female sex ratio 1099 state av=1084 literacy rate 92.80 % state av=94.0 Male literacy 95.49% Female literacy 90.39 % Hindu 55.01% Muslim 42.25% Christian 2.55% Scheduled Caste 9.47% scheduled tribe 0.14% As of the 2001 India census, Thodiyoor had a population of 23,123 with 11,244 males and 11,879 females. The famous temple Malumel Sree Bhagavathi is in this village. ==References== ==Other websites== *http://www.census2011.co.in/data/town/628366-thodiyoor- kerala.html Category:Villages in Kollam district
title: Thodiyoor
